name: pure-swipe-slider
description: A tiny, zero-dependency swipe slider web component (< 4 KB gzipped).

scripts.minify: mkdir -p dist && bun build swipe-slider.js --minify --outfile=dist/swipe-slider.min.js && bun build swipe-slider.css --minify --outfile=dist/swipe-slider.min.css
scripts.compress: npm run gzip && npm run brotli
scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run compress
